title: What is the interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream?

preview.html: Trend provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream. Sidr or buckthorn trees are among the trees planted in the Mediterranean basin, and they are found in abundance in the Levant, Palestine and Egypt. Just as seeing a complete Sidr tree in a dream and choosing from among the visions contained in some people’s dreams, we have also given, dear followers, all the special meanings and evidence to explain the cutting of a Sidr tree. In a complete dream and seeing green Sidr leaves in a complete dream. A Sidr tree in a dream is complemented by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq mentioned that seeing sea buckthorn in a dream is full of visions that have a great significance of goodness, life and blessing. Also, seeing Sidr trees in a dream is full of good news and a sign of enjoyment. In this world and a great improvement in the circumstances of the fortuneteller. Also, seeing the green leaves of the Sidr tree in a dream is a sign of money and a lawful life with many blessings. What is the interpretation of the vision of collecting Sidr from the tree indicates the fulfillment of desires and the achievement of many goals. Eating Sidr in The dream is complete, and the dreamer was sick or bound with straps, is evidence of recovery from illness, improvement of all conditions, and relief from distress. The complete interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream for a common woman. The sea buckthorn tree in an old woman’s dream is a sign of moving to a new life and getting out of a state of distress. And the sadness in which she was living. Picking sea buckthorn fruits from a tree in a dream for a girl indicates success, success, and achieving the highest peaks. But seeing the cutting of a sidr tree in a dream full of public women is considered an undesirable vision that indicates the severing of relationships and death. Eating sea buckthorn in a dream Completely away from the tree is good news for good luck and livelihood, and a sign of happiness and close marriage. What is the interpretation of seeing a sea buckthorn tree for a married woman? Seeing a whole Sidr tree in a dream for a married woman indicates a feeling of love and familiarity and is a sign of psychological comfort. The leaves of the Sidr tree are full for a woman, foretelling a lot of good and wonderful food that she will receive in her life. Dreaming about eating whole Sidr leaves or boiling them and drinking them is a sign of healing, solving their problems, and improving their condition. What is the interpretation of seeing a sea buckthorn tree for a pregnant woman? Seeing a tree is a story in A pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the ease of giving birth without problems or issues. Seeing sea buckthorn in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates a significant improvement in her health and recovery from diseases. Interpretation of seeing a cut down Sidr tree in a dream. Seeing a cut down Sidr tree in a dream is full of dreams mentioned by most interpretation scholars. It is considered undesirable and a sign of misfortunes. Seeing sea buckthorn in a dream also indicates bad luck and entering a period full of difficulties and problems. Dreaming of seeing green sidr leaves in a dreamThe interpretation of seeing a green sidr leaf in a dream, full of good news of happiness and a way out of a state of despair and psychological fatigue. Interpretation of seeing sidr falling in a dream: Seeing crushed sidr leaves in a dream is a sign of ill health

title: The door in a dream and the interpretation of opening the door and trying to close the door in a dream

preview.html: Learn with us the interpretation of dreaming about a door in a dream and the opinion of Ibn Sirin and dream interpreters about seeing a door opening in a dream or closing the door in a dream or trying to close the door and its interpretation. Repairing the door and seeing the door closed for someone in a dream or opening the door for someone. The door in a dream: Seeing the door generally refers to the owner of the house, and the new door in the dream is interpreted as a new child for someone whose wife was pregnant. As for the old door in the dream, it indicates the old life, whether It was a successful or unsuccessful life. Whoever dreams that he enters through an old door, the dream indicates that he will return to something from his old life. Perhaps his return to his ex-wife, or a job he left, or something like that. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a key: Seeing someone in a dream more than Once for a broken door in a dream, it can indicate failure and disappointment, and it can indicate illness or perhaps suffering, extreme fear, poverty or death. This vision could belong to the owner of the door, whether it is a god or someone else. Seeing a door in dreams indicates The disappearance of worry and fear, and God knows best. Opening a door in a dream. Seeing open doors in a dream means that the doors of sustenance are opening for the dreamer. Seeing a door opening in a dream portends a lot of goodness, and opening a door can mean success and blessings from God Almighty. As for whoever thinks that he is opening the door With a key, this indicates success and shows travel and perhaps wealth and achieving the goals that the viewer seeks. As for the door key in dreams, it can indicate blessings and success in life. As for whoever sees doors opening in the street, this is wonderful food, but it goes back to others. As for if he sees the doors of his house Open, for sustenance is for the people of his household. Opening the door to facilitate matters, but an open door in the opposite direction could indicate a calamity or disaster. As for seeing the doors wide open or expanding, it may indicate that unauthorized intruders have descended on the dreamer. I read about that: The old house in a dream Seeing your beloved in a dream Trying to close the door in a dream Whoever saw in a dream that he closed the door opened in the dream on himself or that he was trying to close the door in the dream The dream indicates that this person abstains from sins or tries to stay away from them. This is because of the words of God Almighty: “ She, who was in her house, came to him herself, closed the doors, and said: I hate you, and he said: God forbid. “Closing the door may indicate marriage, and whoever sees that an iron door has been closed or finds it closed, then he marries a virgin. And the interpretation of trying to close the door in a dream and the dreamer will not be able to close it, because this is a difficult matter for him on the part of his wife. Trying to close the door in a dream for a woman Being married is also a difficult matter for her and she is trying to end it, and it could be from the husband or from the husband’s family. The interpretation of trying to close the door in a dream for an unmarried woman may indicate her rejection of whoever proposes to marry her. Trying to close the door in a dream for a divorced woman could be a sign To keep her away from sins and perhaps get rid of something like that

title: Interpretation of a dream about a Saran dog in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about a Saran dog in a dream: If you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about a Saran dog in a dream, it is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know an explanation for that, so we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, and they are the interpretations of some working scholars, not website managers. Who interfere in the interpretations, but convey the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a Saran dog in a dream. Seeing a dog in a dream means that the dreamer is a very hasty personality. Seeing a crazy dog ​​in a dream may mean that a person may make many hasty decisions in his life. Seeing a dog in a dream may It indicates some problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces during those days. Whoever sees a mad dog in his dream may indicate that he is a person whose opinion has changed greatly during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about resisting dogs in a dream: Seeing a dog resisting in a dream can indicate a struggle against The problem that the dreamer falls into on those days, and God knows best. In the event that a person sees that he is resisting dogs, this may indicate his ability to achieve goals and ambitions during those days. If you see a dog attacking a person while doing so, this may indicate good changes occurring in His life during this time. If one sees a dog resisting in a dream, this may indicate good changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about dogs running after me in a dream. Anyone who dreams that dogs are chasing and attacking him can indicate the presence of an actor. He is trying to destroy his reputation. Dreaming of dogs chasing the visionary in the dream could indicate that a problem remains that the owner of the vision was big. If one sees that dogs are jumping on him, this may indicate that his enemies are surrounding him, and he should ask God for help. In the event that you see Dogs chasing a person in a dream, this may be an indication of feeling sad and sad at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about dogs inside the house in a dream: In the event that you see a group of dogs around the house, this may indicate evil that may be approaching the people of the house and must be prevented. It may indicate Dreaming of ugly dogs inside the house in a dream indicates that there are people who are not well in their lives at that time and they must ask God for help. Anyone who dreams that a dog was inside the house in a dream may indicate changes occurring among the people of the house, so he must ask God for help. If you see dogs inside the house in a dream, this may indicate the presence of a corrupt person and you must stay away from him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a dog in a dream: Slaughtering a dog and eating its meat may indicate that there are many goals that one wishes to achieve. If one sees in his dream that Slaughtering a dog, this may indicate that he overcame a major problem he was facing at that time. In the event that a person sees that he slaughtered a dog in a dream, this may be a sign of positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period. Whoever sees in his dream that he Slaughtering a dog in a dream, it may indicate hearing good news in that day

title: Learn about the interpretation of twins in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Twins in a dream, interpreters see that the dream symbolizes goodness and carries a lot of good tidings for the dreamer, but it indicates evil in some cases. Twins in a dream The interpretation of a dream about twins indicates the dreamer's feeling of happiness and peace of mind after a long period of tension and anxiety, and indicates the financial assistance that he will soon provide to a specific person in his life. If the dreamer sees a woman from his relatives giving birth to twins, the dream indicates that he will live a wonderful love story in the near future and this story will end with a happy marriage, but if the dreamer is engaged and sees in his life a dream of three twin children, this indicates that he will soon separate from his fiancée because there is a lot of disagreement between them and because he cannot understand her. Twins in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin sees that seeing twins means a lot of goodness, happiness and security that the dreamer feels in his home and within his family, but if the dreamer sees sick twins in his dream, this means that he will suffer from some worries. And problems in the coming period and he must be patient and strong and not give up. If the dreamer is a student of knowledge and sees triplets, the dream indicates that he will succeed in his studies and will soon get the highest grades. Hearing the sound of twins in a dream means that the dreamer will fall into a big problem in the next period, but he will get out of it easily after a while. Seeing him playing with twins predicts the dreamer that he will have a happy event in the coming days. Looking for Ibn Sirin's interpretations? Enter from Google and see them all. The dream interpretation site on the Internet. Twins in a single dream Seeing twins for unmarried women indicates that they are doing many wrong and inappropriate actions and this matter can lead to great losses if they do not change. If the dreamer is a science student and sees herself giving birth to twins, the dream indicates that she will succeed in her studies and achieve all her dreams in the near future. If the dreamer is currently living a love story and dreamed that she gave birth to twins, a male and a female, this indicates her separation from her partner. Thus. Also, seeing beautiful twins indicates that an unmarried woman will succeed in her practical life and achieve many achievements and occupy important positions in her work, indicating that she will get a large sum of money in the near future. Twins in a dream for a married woman The interpretation of seeing twins in a dream for a married woman is not good, as it indicates that she will face a painful accident in the near future. If the dreamer dreams that she gave birth to twins, she has abundant good news of nutrition, and she will spend many happy events in the coming days, and the twins symbolize the good condition of her children and their excellence in their studies. Seeing male twins in a dream for a married woman Seeing male twins is an indication that the dreamer feels safe and happy in her married life, and if the owner of the vision faces a certain problem at the present time and dreams that she gave birth to male twins, this indicates that this problem will

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the vagina for a virgin from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream of a lot of blood coming out of the vagina.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about blood coming out of the vagina for a virgin. Is seeing blood coming out of the vagina good or bad? What are the negative interpretations of a dream about blood coming out of the Virgin Mary’s vagina? What does vaginal bleeding portend in a woman’s dream? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of the vision of blood coming out of the virgin’s vagina according to Ibn Sirin and the leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of the dream of blood coming out of the vagina for a virgin: The blood that comes out of the vagina in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the approaching date of her marriage and that she will enjoy happiness and material well-being with her partner throughout her life. Seeing the fiancée indicates the date of her marriage. She is approaching her wedding and predicts that she will have children soon after the wedding. If the dreamer is in pain when blood comes out of her vagina in her dream, this means that something bad will happen to her soon and she must be careful and careful, saving her from anxiety and positive change that will happen soon. The dream Black blood coming out of the vulva is a sign of negligence in performing prayer, and alerts the dreamer to hasten repentance before it is too late. Interpretation of a dream of blood coming out of the vagina for a virgin by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the blood coming out of the vagina in a dream of the Virgin Mary as a sign of troubles that she is going through in This moment, and if bad blood comes out of the girl’s vagina in her dream, this indicates her suffering. From pain and illness. She should ask the Lord (Almighty) to heal her quickly. A little blood coming out of the vagina is a sign that something bad has happened to one of the dreamer’s family members or that he is suffering from many family disputes and problems. Ibn Sirin believes that the blood that comes out of the vagina of an unmarried woman indicates earning halal money and shows that he will soon fulfill a certain covenant. He obtained it in the previous period, and the abundant blood indicates the positive changes that will occur to her. A dreamer soon, the wishes that he will fulfill and the happiness that he will enjoy. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, the Dream Interpretation website on the Internet, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. The most important interpretations of the dream that blood comes out of the vagina for a virgin. Interpretation of a dream about heavy bleeding from the vaginaIf the dreamer sees blood It flows profusely from her vagina, then this is a sign of the good news that he will soon hear at the university she wants. It is said that the blood that drips profusely from the vagina in a virgin’s dream is a sign that she will break her routine and try new things soon, even if some interpreters say that the abundant blood symbolizes To the dreamer's imminent marriage to the man he loves or is consummated. In a wonderful emotional relationship that culminates in a happy marriage. Interpretation of blood coming out of the vagina for a single woman: Interpreters believe that the dream of blood coming out of the vagina for an unmarried woman heralds the facilitation of difficult matters and freedom from problems and worries. Partner.Interpretation of dreams with black blood coming out of the vagina. To dream of black blood coming out of the vagina symbolizes making mistakes or acting rashly at this time, so the dreamer needs to re-examine himself and step back.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my mother spraying me with water in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my mother sprinkling water on me in a dream. If you want to know what the interpretation of a dream about my mother sprinkling water on me in a dream means, in the following lines we will show all of this and more details... Interpretation of a dream about my mother sprinkling me with water in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my mother sprinkling water on me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing water splashing in a dream could be a sign of some problems, and God knows best. While sprinkling water on a man in a dream could represent money and livelihood, and God knows everything that no one has seen. title: Interpretation of a dream about a sheikh according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In this article, learn about the interpretation of seeing a sheikh in a dream for different occasions. Seeing a sheikh in reality shows several connotations, most notably understanding in religion, wisdom, piety, and piety, but seeing in a dream is one of the mysterious dreams in which the dreamer does not know what the consequences of this vision are. Among the interesting visions to know their interpretations, which may warn the dreamer of goodness or warn him that something bad will happen to him, in the encyclopedia we will learn about Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this vision. The Sheikh in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin mentioned that if the dreamer sees an old man who appears happy in a dream, this vision is It indicates the stability and happiness of the dreamer’s life in reality, but if he sees him sad, this is a reflection of psychological evil. The dreamer’s condition. If the dreamer sees an old man committing forbidden acts in reality, then this vision expresses the dreamer’s sins and transgressions. Seeing many good-looking sheikhs in a dream indicates that the dreamer enjoys health and well-being. Seeing a tribal sheikh in a dream expresses the dreamer’s good company. But if the dreamer sees an old sick man in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will suffer from illness. Seeing an old man in a dream represents the death of anxiety and is an indication of the good behavior that the dreamer has. Seeing an old man wearing white in a dreamIf the dreamer sees an old man wearing white clothes In a dream, this vision symbolizes guidance and good luck, in addition to the good health and well-being that he enjoys in reality. This vision also shows the stability of the pioneer’s psychological state. Seeing a cleric in a dream for a single woman. As for the meaning of this dream for an unmarried girl, it is evidence of good health. Status, integrity, and piety. This vision gives the dreamer good news that worries and sorrows will pass and things will calm down. It also indicates her marriage to a man of good conduct and morals. As for marrying a religious man in a dream, this vision expresses the fulfillment of desires in reality. Interpretation of a sheikh’s dream for a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream For a married woman, it is a sign of her high morals and the good reputation that the dreamer enjoys. But if the sheikh in the dream is her husband, then this vision indicates kindness and nourishment, because it expresses receiving a lot of money. Interpretation of the sheikh in a dream about a pregnant woman. As for the meaning of this vision, It brings good news for her that childbirth will facilitate her and also expresses her enjoyment of her health and well-being. Among the symbols of this vision for a pregnant woman is that it symbolizes the birth of a male child, and God knows best. We have presented to you the most important things mentioned in the Sheikh’s interpretation of a dream by Ibn Shirin, and at the end of this article we note that All of these interpretations mentioned are nothing but the jurisprudence of dream interpretation scholars. This means that no one can be sure of their fulfillment because only God knows the unseen. To interpret a different dream, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of a dream about performing prayer

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about performing prayer in a dream on the Moments website, the largest website in the Middle East about the interpretation of dreams and the extent of their impact on our public and private lives. Prayer helps us communicate with the Almighty and turn to Him so that we feel safe when we face any danger in our lives. Interpretation of a dream about performing prayer for the pregnant, engaged, married, and divorced woman. It is even the gateway to hope for the future that we dream of achieving, because God always hears you in your prayers and listens to various disturbances, so the interpretation of prayer In a dream it has many different meanings and often depends on the personality of the person. The dreamer himself, and this is what we will present to you in this article below. Seeing a call in a dream indicates separation that occurs between loved ones or it means performing acts of obedience. Whoever sees in a dream that he stood up and said the call once or twice, then established the prayer and performed his prayer, then it becomes clear in his vision that he will succeed in Hajj or that he will perform Umrah in his house, God forbid, God willing, and whoever sees in his dream that he is calling the call to prayer in the streets of his city, then his vision It indicates his righteousness and his call to goodness, if the dreamer is one of the people of the righteous. Interpretation of the dream of establishing prayer, a complete interpretation, but if he is not like that and he is one of the people of heresy and misguidance, then his vision shows the assault and beating that he is subjected to, and whoever sees in his dream that he is lying down and making the call. In prayer: which is his marriage to a girl. Pictures to interpret the vision of performing prayer in a dream. Establishing prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Nabulsi say that seeing the call to prayer in a dream has many different meanings and meanings, which differ depending on the situation in which the dreamer is in his dream, as they explained in detail in this. The vision and the meanings that the vision carries in its interpretation books. Interpreters say that seeing the call in a dream indicates separation between loved ones or that it means obedience that must be performed. Then he established the prayer and performed his prayer, so his vision indicates that he will succeed in performing the Hajj obligation or that he will perform the Umrah to the Sacred House of God, God willing. And whoever sees in his dream that he interrupts the call and stands on a high place calling for prayer, then his vision indicates his righteousness and behavior in the path of calling to God and that he From the people of God. For the sake of good and forbidding evil. And whoever sees in his dream that he is calling to a well, then his vision shows that he is inviting people to travel and urging them to do so. And the person who sees in a dream that he has become a muezzin to call to prayer and in reality he does not work as a muezzin, then his vision indicates a new position and a new place. If the dreamer is qualified to lead. Whoever sees in his dream that he is making the call from a hill and from a height, then his vision shows the decision and status that he will obtain if he is suitable for it, even if he is not suitable for it. Then his vision indicates profitable trade and deals or trade that brings profit to the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that he is making the call, but changes the words of the call, or increases or decreases them, then his vision shows the injustice and oppression that the dreamer imposes on others. The extent of the change in the call to prayer. Whoever sees in his dream that he is interrupting the call in the streets of his city, then the vision

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing cats in a man’s dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cats in a dream for a man: There are many visions that worry their owner, which prompts him to work to find out the meanings and interpretations of these visions. One of the most important dreams that men largely see in their dreams is the dream of seeing cats, as this vision varies from man to woman, as interpretation scholars have worked to clarify the interpretation of this particular vision. A person and the nature of the dream he saw in a dream. A person can interpret a dream about cats in a dream for a man. Interpretation of a dream about seeing cats in a dream for a single man. So, famous and famous interpretive scholars have made their efforts to interpret various dreams based on a set of rules and foundations. Among the most prominent interpretations of seeing cats in a dream are the following: Keeping a man away from a cat in a dream means getting rid of the problems he faces at work. A white cat in an unmarried person’s dream indicates his approaching marriage to a beautiful and fair girl. A black cat in a single person’s dream shows the darkening of the heart. And betrayal of a lover. Seeing a bachelor feeding a cat is a sign of goodness, blessing, and abundant food. Seeing an ugly cat in a young man’s dream means failing a test or losing money. Chasing cats in a bachelor’s dream indicates a strain of faith, as genes often appear in the form of cats. Seeing single cats attacking him in a dream indicates trouble from friends and loved ones. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the name Muhammad in a dream for a single and married woman according to Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about seeing cats in a dream for a married manIf the man who saw cats in his dream is married, the vision has many meanings and connotations. Different from the interpretations of a single person. The clearest interpretations of a dream about seeing cats in a married man’s dream are as follows: Seeing a married man chasing cats in his dream means that he is facing problems at work. A white cat in a married man’s dream indicates that he has his wife, cares about his family’s affairs, and gives her tenderness and warmth. For a married man to see A beautiful cat drinks water in a dream, this means that his wife will become pregnant soon. Seeing a cat eating in a man’s house in a dream indicates that God has greatly increased that man’s goodness. If a married man sees that he admires a cat passing in front of him, this indicates that the man He will marry another woman. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing eating honey in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. Interpretation of the dream of seeing cats in the house. Also, seeing cats in a dream has many interpretations that differ depending on the dreamer and the nature of the dream. Interpretations of seeing cats in the house are as follows: Seeing cats According to Nabulsi, in the house in a dream indicates the presence of a thief or a traitor. A dream about cats in the house indicates the presence of someone who approaches the dreamer with malicious tricks, playing in the house and hiding conspiracies from him. Cats in the house in a dream symbolize waiting for a business opportunity to corrupt and sabotage the people of the house. Login A cat in the house in a dream in Nabulsi indicates the presence of a thief who is planning to steal the house. The interpretation of a dream about cats in the house carries a warning of the danger that awaits the owner of the dream, so no one should be safe when entering

title: Interpretation of a dream about a haunted doll

preview.html: In recent years, the stages of making dolls have evolved into real characters since they were fictional characters, but seeing a manned and moving doll in a dream has other symbols that differ between good and bad. Interpretation of a dream about a doll in a dream A doll in a dream refers to the man who is the creator or inventor. Seeing a moving doll in a dream symbolizes To the dreamer’s ability to solve his problems and overcome them with intelligence and wisdom. A doll in a woman’s dream indicates feelings and emotions. A man who dreams of throwing away a doll and getting rid of it means that he repents for a great sin he committed. An unmarried young man who dreams that children are playing with a doll in his dream indicates that he will get married soon. Dreaming about a broken doll is a sign of death and the loss of a loved one. Anyone who sees a teddy bear in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s need for love and affection from people around him. Meaning of a dream about a doll in a dream Seeing a moving doll in a dream indicates that the dreamer is distinguished from others by his talent In acting, singing, or acting. It also indicates that the dreamer has special abilities to treat others and his ability to exploit them in positive things that will benefit him in his future. The meaning of dreaming about a haunted doll in a dream: Seeing a haunted doll moving in a dream means that someone is thinking about harming the fortuneteller. As for a dream A haunted, talking doll indicates the presence of enemies around the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about buying a new doll: Seeing yourself buying a new doll in a dream symbolizes a new and happy life. When one dreams of children playing with a new doll, this is a sign of hearing happy news. When the dreamer dreams of an ugly doll, He has to turn to God and recite Ayat al-Kursi. The concept of a dream about a teddy bear When someone dreams of seeing a teddy bear, this shows his connection to his childhood memories. The vision also indicates the dreamer’s need for security and stability. The concept of a dream about a teddy bear Who dreams that he bought a new teddy bear and gave it to someone else for interest among them. Maybe This means a strong friendship. It also indicates joy and happiness. It symbolizes success and excellence. Add the dream you would like to interpret, indicating your marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.
